Title: Requires information on resources for domestic violence and human trafficking victims to be posted in public restrooms
Summary: Requires information on resources for domestic violence and human trafficking victims to be posted in public restrooms and other areas of public buildings which shall be deemed appropriate.
LawCode: Add ยง145, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public buildings law, in relation to requiring information on resources for domestic violence and human trafficking victims to be posted in public restrooms
